[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1448604362911{margin-bottom: 100px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9″][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1449140720718{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-xs” css=”.vc_custom_1449140656921{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}”][rev_slider_vc alias=”about_us_slider”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1449140651655{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”]

We are TransCargo!

Logistics Ground’s flexible model, using only quality carriers, means you benefit from improved service levels, greater flexibility and time-definite deliveries. Our expertise in transport management and planning allows us to design a solution that meets your needs and also quickly respond to any event disruptions, such as weather.

Integrated Road networks, covering the world. Through our global network of control towers and state-of-the-art technology, we are able to monitor and dynamically react to situations such as adverse weather, additional pick ups or drop offs, or heavy traffic, meaning that your goods are always travelling the most efficient route.

Our non-asset based Road network provides you with flexibility, improved service levels, accelerated delivery, reduced direct and indirect costs and much less complexity.

 

Our Mission

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1448605934156{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1449140861901{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”]

  • Deliver Environmentally Responsible Client Services
  • Provide Employees with an Attractive Working Environment
  • Be an Active Community Partner
  • Maintain High Ethical Standards
  • Drive Continuous Improvement

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

  • Freight Security
  • Air & Ocean Cargo Insurance
  • Our highly efficient customs brokerage
  • Clearance and compliance service
  • We ensure complete security

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Partners” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][stm_image_carousel grayscale=”yes” img_size=”full” autoplay=”yes” items=”5″ items_mobile=”2″ images=”1264,1263,1261,1260,1259,1258″ css=”.vc_custom_1450442135053{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Frequently Asked Questions” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_tta_accordion style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”theme_style” c_icon=”chevron” c_position=”right” active_section=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1448604377520{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_tta_section title=”HOW MANY TIMES DO I HAVE TO TELL YOU A FEW DIFFERENT WAYS?” tab_id=”1447734797771-9e120a4a-d349″][vc_column_text]Progressively generate synergistic total linkage through cross-media intellectual capital. Enthusiastically parallel task team building e-tailers without standards compliant initiatives. Progressively monetize client-centric outsourcing with excellent communities.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”WHAT IS DO I HAVE TO TELL YOU A FEW LOREM?” tab_id=”1447734839113-ff62a5f8-66d2″][vc_column_text]Progressively generate synergistic total linkage through cross-media intellectual capital. Enthusiastically parallel task team building e-tailers without standards compliant initiatives. Progressively monetize client-centric outsourcing with excellent communities.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”I have a technical problem or support issue I need resolved, who do I email?” tab_id=”1447734838300-ee0e3a49-42dc”][vc_column_text]Progressively generate synergistic total linkage through cross-media intellectual capital. Enthusiastically parallel task team building e-tailers without standards compliant initiatives.
